summary: Have you ever thought it was dumb, that when you became a Legate, you had no men to command? Or maybe you've just wanted to lead a small clan of bandits, to pillage a hamlet. Well look no further than this mod, as you immerse yourself in an excellent roleplaying experience!
descriptionHtml:
New Editions
____________________________________________________________________________________________






This mod was originally created for personal use, but I put it here for you enjoyment.

I know there are many mods out their like this (most of them better than mine ) but I made this mod to be simple and compatible. No fancy hair, or armor mods, just simple.

Now, on to the good stuff...

UNITS
____________________________________________________________________________________________

Imperial Soldiers- 2 Swordsmen, 1 Archer, and 1 Officer- All located at Castle Dour (inside).

Stormcloak Rebels- 2 Warriors, 1 Scout, and 1 Leader- Located at the Blue Palace.

Penitus Oculatus Agents- 2 Agents, 1 Marksman, 1 Captain- Located at the Penitus Oculatus HQ in Dragon Bridge.

Forsworn- 2 Forsworn Melee Fighters, 1 Forager, 1 Briarheart-Hiding out in the Markarth Warrens.

Bandit Clan- 2 Basic Bandits, 1 Orc Ranger, 1 Chief- Resting at the Inn in Rorikstead.

Vampire Family- 1 Vampire, 1 Archer, 1 Mistress, 1 Master- Whiterun Hall of the Dead.

 Hold Guards- For Morthal, Whiterun, and Solitude- Each in their corrosponding guard houses, and in Castle Dour

 Argonian Pirates- 2 Pirates, 1 Light Scout, 1 Captain-The female one talks like a human, for there are no female argonian follower dialog options.

 Alik'r Warriors- 2 Sellswords, 1 Bowmaster, 1 Chief- Looking for the Redguard woman at the Bannered Mare.

Vigilants of Stendarr- 4 Vigils, no more hunting Daedra alone! - Located at the Hall of Vigil.

Thalmor Elves- 2 Soldiers, 1 Archer, 1 Thalmor Mage- Looking for Talos worshippers at the Radient Raimence.

Nightingales- 2 Nightingales, 1 Sniper, 1 Master- Residing at the Ragged Flagon (Wouldn't recommend recruiting them until all Thieves Guild Missions are completed, just for immersions
sake)

Thieves- 2 Thieves, 1 Ranged Assassin, 1 Expert Thief- Located at the thieves guild.

Orc Warriors- 2 Beserkers, 1 Ranger, 1 War Chief- Located at the inn in Morthal.

Khajiit Caravan- 2 Caravan Guards, 1 Farmer, 1 Lumberjack- Trading at the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood.

Silver Hand Soldiers- 2 Infantry, 1 Ranger, 1 Brute- Readying to attack the Companions at the Drunken Huntsmen.


All units are loyal to the player, meaning you can make the Legion Soldiers fight the Legion.



Notes
__________________________________________________________________________________________

Please give me suggestions on which factions you would like to see next. I will even do your own custom factions you made up, just provide a description. (See Whats to Come)


Requirements
___________________________________________________________________________________________

This mod has no requirements, but I will give you a few suggestions.

Perfect Legionnaire - Imperial Armor Reforged 4-0-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6085
Improves the Imperial Legions Armor ten-fold.

Skyrim Stormcloaks Enhanced-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6024
Makes the Stormcloak (and guard's) armor look much more refined.

UFO- Ultimate Follower Overhaul-http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037 (or any unlimited follower mod) My mod is somewhat useless without some kind of unlimited follower mod, I recommend this one.


What's To Come
__________________________________________________________________________________________

More Darkbrotherhood Initiates*

Orc Warriors*-COMPLETED

Mercenaries*

Alik'r Warriors*-COMPLETED

Khajit Caravans*-COMPLETED

Mages*

Thieves*-COMPLETED

Nightingales*-COMPLETED

Thalmor*-COMPLETED

Vigilants of Stendarr*-COMPLETED

Corsairs*

Shadowscales*

Rangers/Hunters*-WORKING ON

I have completed a good amount of these, if I see that even a few people take a small liking in this, I will be sure to add them.

Thanks for taking the time to read at least a partial amount of this. ;D Enjoy

REMEMBER: Always report any bugs or errors to me, I will be quick to solve them.
author: QWWW23
